alert.note: Alert for Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:23PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stokes and Patrick Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1022 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sanville to near Penns Store to Hanging Rock State Park. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danbury... Sandy Ridge... Penns Store... Critz... Dillard... Prestonville... and Ayersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
